item.description:
This event was just sent to me and sounds like it could be a fun place to meet on Saturday night. If not our cup of tea we can always head out later for munchies and have a drink at one of the venues on 3A near 128. Of course, if lots of us show up and dance it WILL be fun, these things are always only as much fun as WE make them!!!

Singles Dance
American Legion Hall
162 Winn Street
Burlington, MA
Saturday January 26th
8 PM to Midnight
Cost $8 at the door

Awesome interactive DJ, door prizes, split the pot, cash bar, & free refreshments!
The event is sponsored by Parents Without Partners.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Saturday Singles Dance
